players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. Villagers, unite against the mafioso."
Charlie: "Thanks Bob, I'll keep an eye on Diana. Let's work together!"
Diana: "Charlie, watch Bob closely. I'm the detective and found out who the mafioso is."
Charlie: "Thanks Diana, I'll watch Bob. Charlie will keep an eye on both of you."
Diana: "Charlie, watch Bob; I'm the detective and found him to be the mafioso. Unite against him."
You: "Diana & Charlie, stay vigilant. I'll target Diana next if suspicions hold."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
